pilots.name: Breach

shipAbility.name: Pursuit Thrusters
shipAbility.text: During the System Phase, you may perform a [Boost] action.

pilots.ability: After you fully execute a maneuver or perform a [Boost] action, if you moved through an enemy ship, you may acquire a lock on that ship.
pilots.caption: Ordnance Expert

pilots.name: Scorch

shipAbility.name: Pursuit Thrusters
shipAbility.text: During the System Phase, you may perform a [Boost] action.

pilots.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-1 performs a primary attack, it may spend 1 [Hit] result. If it does, after defending, the defender gains 1 strain token.
pilots.caption: Jad Bean

pilots.name: Grudge

shipAbility.name: Pursuit Thrusters
shipAbility.text: During the System Phase, you may perform a [Boost] action.

pilots.ability: While a friendly bomb or mine at range 0-2 detonates, each time attack dice are rolled to resolve its effect, you may reroll up to 1 of those dice.
pilots.caption: Hateful Harrier

pilots.name: First Order Cadet

shipAbility.name: Pursuit Thrusters
shipAbility.text: During the System Phase, you may perform a [Boost] action.

pilots.text: The live-fire exercices of the First Order are intended to root out the weak, enforcing the maxim that only the strong survive.
